mutation {
	createDataproduct(
		input: {
			name: "NewName"
			description: "New description"
            productAreaID: "Mocked-001"
            teamID: "team-001"
			group: "team@nav.no"
            teamContact: "#team"
            teamkatalogenURL: "team"
		}
	) {
		id
	}
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.createDataproduct.id=IGNORE

ENDOPTS
{
  "data": {
    "createDataproduct": {
    }
  }
}

STORE dataproduct_id=data.createDataproduct.id
